node.title: Homes That Sold for Around $1 Million
node.description: Recent residential sales in New York City and the region.
node.content: ["Each week, our survey of recent residential sales in New York City and the surrounding region focuses on homes that sold around a certain price point, allowing you to compare single-family homes, condos and co-ops in different locales.", "The \u201clist price\u201d is the asking price when the property came on the market with the most recent broker. The time on the market is measured from the most recent listing to the closing date of the sale.", "This 2,875-square-foot house, built in 1882, has a wraparound porch, a living room with a gas fireplace, a kitchen with granite counters and a primary suite with a vaulted ceiling on 0.29 acres.", "21 weeks on the market", "$1,599,900 list price", "15% below list price", "Costs $15,607 a year in taxes; $659 a year in homeowner association fees", "Listing broker William Pitt Sotheby\u2019s International Realty", "A prewar co-op, with exposed brick walls, a living room that has a fireplace and bay window and a kitchen with quartz counters and a wine refrigerator in a walk-up building with a roof deck.", "21 weeks on the market", "$1,100,000 list price", "5% above list price", "Costs $765 a month in maintenance", "Listing broker Compass", "A 28-year-old, 4,191-square-foot house, with a living room that has a fireplace and a vaulted ceiling, a kitchen with granite counters and a countertop range, and an attached four-car garage, on more than two acres.", "19 weeks on the market", "$1,000,000 list price", "2% below list price", "Costs $23,319 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Howard Hanna/Rand Realty", "This 650-square-foot postwar condo has hardwood floors, a living room with a door to a balcony, a pass-through kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, and a washer and dryer in a doorman building with a gym.", "7 weeks on the market", "$950,000 list price", "5% above list price", "Costs $957 a month in common charges; $769 a month in taxes; $278 a month in special assessments through last month", "Listing broker Compass", "A 54-year-old, 2,178-square-foot, colonial-style house, with a living room that has a bay window, a kitchen with red-lacquered cabinets and a bay window, a bluestone patio and a pool, on 0.24 acres.", "28 weeks on the market", "$1,138,000 list price", "8% below list price", "Costs $23,353 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Douglas Elliman", "This 1,545-square-foot duplex condo has an open kitchen with quartz counters and island seating, a built-out walk-in closet, a washer and dryer and a deeded parking space in a non-doorman 2008 building.", "8 weeks on the market", "$1,049,000 list price", "5% below list price", "Costs $14,462 a year in taxes ; $277 a month in common charges", "Listing broker Sawyer Smith Residential"]
